vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Ezr.2.8
§ Zattu = "brightness of him"
a family of exiles who returned with Zerubbabel
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
薩土 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "他的明亮 "
跟著所羅巴伯被擄歸回的一個家族
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
萨土 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "他的明亮 "
跟着所罗巴伯被掳归回的一个家族

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.10.14
§ Zattu = "brightness of him"
a family of exiles who returned with Zerubbabel
